column4: Hola, i found a guide to install my wireless card, it says to put a bin file into /lib/hotplug/firmware, but i don't have that folder, wich folder should i use?

this don't have anything, is a .bin file inside the windows driver disk
not really sure then .. create that directory and place your firmware in it
